GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.18 to before v4.14.298
GSD.description:
ALSA: aoa: i2sbus: fix possible memory leak in i2sbus_add_dev()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.298 by commit 802532a50acf501fdafe38a84ca2aa886d68af68, it was introduced in version v2.6.18 by commit f3d9478b2ce468c3115b02ecae7e975990697f15. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: aoa: i2sbus: fix possible memory leak in i2sbus_add_dev()
